title: The exemplary lives and memorable acts of nine the most worthy women in the vvorld three Iewes. Three gentiles. Three Christians. Written by the author of the History of women.
author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for Richard Royston, and are to be sold at the signe of the Angell in Ivie Lane,
